sections.heading: Trauma Advisory Board; duties.The State Trauma Advisory Board shall:(1) Advise the department regarding trauma care needs throughout the state;(2) Advise the Board of Emergency Medical Services regarding trauma care to be provided throughout the state by emergency medical services;(3) Review propose
sections.text: Trauma Advisory Board; duties.The State Trauma Advisory Board shall:(1) Advise the department regarding trauma care needs throughout the state;(2) Advise the Board of Emergency Medical Services regarding trauma care to be provided throughout the state by emergency medical services;(3) Review proposed departmental rules and regulations for trauma care; and(4) Recommend modifications in rules regarding trauma care.SourceLaws 1997, LB 626, ยง 37;Laws 2009, LB195, ยง 99;Laws 2020, LB1002, ยง 52;Laws 2023, LB227, ยง 108.
